markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Life Boost](/Spells.aspx?ID=799)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 238 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Life](/Lessons.aspx?ID=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 4 rounds
</row>

</column>

---

You temporarily bolster the target's vitality. The target gains fast healing equal to double the spell's level.
name: Life Boost
